attributes.action: make it law for depot injections to be given to dangerous mentally ill people in the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there has been many lives been taken by mentally ill patients living in the community.   this has happened because the client has not taken recommended prescribed medication which would improve their mental well being.dangerous sufferers who live in the community who refuse their medication should be given depot injections compulsory to prevent them becoming severely ill which does cause them to be a danger to themselves and others.
